item.title: Emily add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "You're going to come across people in your life who will say all the right words at all the right times. But in the end, it's always their actions you should judge them by. It's actions, not words, that matter." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Emily add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "I finally understood what true love meant...love meant that you care for another person's happiness more than your own, no matter how painful the choices you face might be." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Emily add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "When you're struggling with something, look at all the people around you and realize that every single person you see is struggling with something, and to them, it's just as hard as what you're going through." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Emily add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "Our story has three parts: a beginning, a middle, and an end. And although this is the way all stories unfold, I still can't believe that ours didn't go on forever." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Emily add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "I don't know that love changes. People change. Circumstances change." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Emily add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "My daddy said, that the first time you fall in love, it changes you forever and no matter how hard you try, that feeling just never goes away." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Emily add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "He was the toast to her butter." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Emily add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "What it's like to be a parent: It's one of the hardest things you'll ever do but in exchange it teaches you the meaning of unconditional love." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Emily add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "I fell in love with her when we were together, then fell deeper in love with her in the years we were apart." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Emily add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "Too many people seem to believe that silence was a void that needed to be filled, even if nothing important was said." -- Nicholas Sparks
